widgets.title: Response Time - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT average(duration) WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' SINCE 30 minutes ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Average Resp Time Last 24 Hours - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' since 1 day ago until 1 minute ago timeseries 30 minutes

widgets.title: Response Time by Web Transaction - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) WHERE transactionType='Web' AND appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET name limit 20

widgets.title: Response Time - On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM PageView SELECT average(duration) WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' SINCE 30 minutes ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Average Resp Time Last 24 Hours - On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' since 1 day ago until 1 minute ago timeseries 30 minutes

widgets.title: Response Time by Web Transaction - On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) WHERE transactionType='Web' AND appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET name limit 20

widgets.title: RPM - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) as 'RPM' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' since 1 hour ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Throughput Last 24 Hours - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*)/30 as 'RPM' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' SINCE yesterday UNTIL 1 minute ago TIMESERIES 30 minutes

widgets.title: Throughput by Transaction - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET name SINCE 30 minutes ago LIMIT 20

widgets.title: RPM - On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) as 'RPM' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' since 1 hour ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Throughput Last 24 Hours - On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*)/30 as 'RPM' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' SINCE yesterday UNTIL 1 minute ago TIMESERIES 30 minutes

widgets.title: Throughput by Transaction - On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET name SINCE 30 minutes ago LIMIT 20

widgets.title: Average Response Time Last Wk vs Prior WK - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' since 1 week ago until 1 minute ago timeseries 30 minutes COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Throughput Last WK vs Prior WK - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*)/30 as 'RPM' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' since 1 week ago until 1 minute ago TIMESERIES 30 minutes COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: HTTP Response Status - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(`response.status`) WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET `response.status`

widgets.title: Average Response Time Last Wk vs Prior WK - On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' since 1 week ago until 1 minute ago timeseries 30 minutes COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Throughput Last WK vs Prior WK - On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*)/30 as 'RPM' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' since 1 week ago until 1 minute ago TIMESERIES 30 minutes COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: HTTP Response Status - On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(`response.status`) WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET `response.status`

widgets.title: Throughput by Day - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET weekdayOf(timestamp) since 7 days ago

widgets.title: 99th, 95th - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT percentile(duration, 50, 95, 99) WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET name

widgets.title: Throughput by Day - On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET weekdayOf(timestamp) since 7 days ago

widgets.title: 99th, 95th - On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT percentile(duration, 50, 95, 99) WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET name

widgets.title: All Transactions Count Avg, Max, Min Duration - AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*), average(duration), max(duration), min(duration) WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET name SINCE 1 day ago limit 500

widgets.title: All Transactions Count Avg, Max, Min Duration - On-Premise
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*), average(duration), max(duration), min(duration) WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET name SINCE 1 day ago limit 500

widgets.title: Monthly Uptime
widgets.nrql: FROM SyntheticCheck SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') AS '%' since 12 months ago facet monthOf(timestamp)
